issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: fix TestTxnNoBuckets.testCTAS - keeps failing on ptest

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{noformat}
@Test
public void testCtasEmpty() throws Exception {
  MetastoreConf.setBoolVar(hiveConf, MetastoreConf.ConfVars.CREATE_TABLES_AS_ACID, true);
  runStatementOnDriver("create table myctas stored as ORC as" +
      " select a, b from " + Table.NONACIDORCTBL);
  List<String> rs = runStatementOnDriver("select ROW__ID, a, b, INPUT__FILE__NAME" +
      " from myctas order by ROW__ID");
}
{noformat}
{noformat}

fields.summary: CTAS on empty table throws NPE from org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.MoveTask

comments.body: yes, you are right.  fixed in patch2

nit: else should be on the same line according to Hive coding standard :)
